mapper.insert: insert into order (order_id, order_rel_user, order_rec_user, order_car_type_id, order_created, order_describe, order_money, order_start_place, order_end_place, order_state) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderRelUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderRecUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderCarTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderStartPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderEndPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderState,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update order set order_rel_user = #{orderRelUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_rec_user = #{orderRecUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_car_type_id = #{orderCarTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_created = #{orderCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_describe = #{orderDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_money = #{orderMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_start_place = #{orderStartPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_end_place = #{orderEndPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_state = #{orderState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select order_id, order_rel_user, order_rec_user, order_car_type_id, order_created, order_describe, order_money, order_start_place, order_end_place, order_state from order where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
